body: Robot planet Haven sees its worst energy crisis in a millennium. Only "chosen one" superboy Molin holds the keys to restore balance, but will he succeed? "Legend of Molin" is a new 3D animation which will run in the prime time slot on CCTV-1 throughout Spring Festival; part one aired yesterday, and the 26-episode series trailer is here.

title: China: Robot animation for the holidays

sentence: Robot planet Haven sees its worst energy crisis in a millennium.
Only "chosen one" superboy Molin holds the keys to restore balance, but will he succeed?
"Legend of Molin" is a new 3D animation which will run in the prime time slot on CCTV-1 throughout Spring Festival; part one aired yesterday, and the 26-episode series trailer is here.
